thread_id.title: Thread Id
thread_id.description: The ID of the thread. If not provided, a random UUID will be generated.

if_exists.title: If Exists
if_exists.description: How to handle duplicate creation. Must be either 'raise' (raise error if duplicate), or 'do_nothing' (return existing thread).

strategy.description: The TTL strategy. 'delete' removes the entire thread.

ttl.description: The time-to-live in minutes from now until thread should be swept.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: A value to pass to an interrupted node.

anyOf.title: Send
anyOf.description: A message to send to a node.

node.title: Node
node.description: The node to send the message to.

items.title: Send
items.description: A message to send to a node.

node.title: Node
node.description: The node to send the message to.

goto.title: Goto
goto.description: Name of the node(s) to navigate to next or node(s) to be executed with a provided input.

command.description: The command associated with the update.

as_node.description: Update the state as if this node had just executed.
